mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(userid,title,content,image1,image2,image3,image4,image5,image6,image7,audio) VALUES (#{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{image2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{image4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image5, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{image6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image7, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{audio,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
